text: Hello, my name is Pervin Yabud and I would like to apply as one of your accounting associates.
I'm 22 years old. I've earned my degree in Bachelor of Science in Accountancy in the
University of Santo Tomas and recently passed the CPA board exam last October. Hiring me is like
getting an all-in-one package. I could do not only financial statements but also tasks in other areas
such as management, marketing, or even graphics design. I consider myself as a team player but
could do jobs excellently alone. I'm resilient and can handle stress easily.
So if you're interested in hiring me please call me or send me a message and
